page.title: 11A day in the life of------
page.content: A day in the life of Emma Stephens.I get up at about 8am,get dressed and have breakfast of ricicles,bacon sandwich or ready break.My mum takes me to school by car at about 8:45am.When I'm at schoolIwait outside and meet my friends then we go in school and hang up our coats then we go in class.After reading we go to assembly. We come back and have lessons with Mrs Moss. Playtime is at 10:40am. The older girls walk round in groups talking about boyfriends while the boys play football. We come in and do some work. At mid-day we have lunch School starts at 1pm. We then look forward to Mr Newton who teaches us in the afternoon.School ends at 3:15.I get home and have a snack,I have another meal when my dad gets in at about 7pm. On Thursday I go swimming.On Friday I go to gym.
